argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pi1grp.2 | |- G = ( J pi1 Y ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ Y e. X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ Y e. X ) -> Y e. X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( 0 [,] 1 ) X. { Y } ) = ( ( 0 [,] 1 ) X. { Y } ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_pi1grplem | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ Y e. X ) -> ( G e. Grp /\ [ ( ( 0 [,] 1 ) X. { Y } ) ] ( ~=ph ` J ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ Y e. X ) -> G e. Grp ) |
